item.description:
Please join us Fri, Jan 6 to celebrate the New Year! Two Conquer artists are performing at Hennessey's on Union St. (Fanueil Hall) from 5-7:30pm -- Mia Boostrom, of two-time America's Got Talent fame, & Ryan McHugh, with a career including regular gigs in the Boston area & beyond as well as a performance for tv's "The Sopranos"! The duo puts on quite a show, playing a range of music including hits across genres like pop, rock & more! No cover & a fun bar that also serves great food! Conquer contact: Nina Pickell, Certified Artist Developer team lead, at 617-513-9631. 

This is a definite fun time! Start your weekend off right with a little bit o' live music, good food and spirits.  I should be there around 5:30pm and will try to get a couple of tables up close in front but this place gets a good after work crowd so it will be busy!

Hennessy's is conveniently located in the Haymarket, easily accessible to the Green, Blue and Orange lines.  Everyone is responsible for their own food and drink. PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU GO. Don't forget to tip your bartender/server! ;)


NOTE: THIS EVENT IS CROSSLISTED WITH SOCIAL FUN AND BOSTON HAPPY HOUR.

Hope to see you there!
item.name: Friday Night Happy Hour
